header.name: Connection
header.description: Options that are desired for the connection

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: Transfer-Encoding
header.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

header.name: cache-control
header.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds

header.name: content-encoding
header.description: The type of encoding used on the data.

header.name: content-type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: fiware-correlator
header.description: Custom header

header.name: vary
header.description: Tells downstream proxies how to match future request headers to decide whether the cached response can be used rather than requesting a fresh one from the origin server.

response.body: {"error":null,"data":[false,[{"code":200,"body":{"text":"create context ctxt$testservice$testalain partition by service from iotEvent(service=\"testservice\" and subservice=\"/testalain\")","timeLastStateChange":1520983756152,"name":"ctxt$testservice$testalain","state":"STARTED"}},{"code":200,"body":{"text":"context ctxt$testservice$testalain select *,\"my_rule_update_ttb\" as ruleName from pattern [every ev=iotEvent(cast(cast(temperature?,String),float)<5.0 and type=\"thing\")]","timeLastStateChange":1520987283454,"name":"my_rule_update_ttb@testservice/testalain","state":"STARTED"}},null],{"n":1,"ok":1},null]}

response.body: {"error":null,"data":[false,[{"code":200,"body":{"text":"create context ctxt$testservice$testalain partition by service from iotEvent(service=\"testservice\" and subservice=\"/testalain\")","timeLastStateChange":1520983756152,"name":"ctxt$testservice$testalain","state":"STARTED"}},{"code":200,"body":{"text":"context ctxt$testservice$testalain select *,\"my_rule_update_ttt\" as ruleName, *,cast(cast(ev.temperature?, String),float) + 1.0 as temp from pattern [every ev=iotEvent(cast(cast(temperature?,String),float)<5.0 and type=\"thing\")]","timeLastStateChange":1521021606306,"name":"my_rule_update_ttt@testservice/testalain","state":"STARTED"}},null],{"n":1,"ok":1},null]}

response.body: {"error":null,"data":[{"_id":"5aa840e9c58ce10001525b5c","name":"my_rule_update_t","text":"select *,\"my_rule_update_t\" as ruleName from pattern [every ev=iotEvent(cast(cast(temperature?,String),float)>30.0 and type=\"thing\")]","action":{"type":"update","parameters":{"attributes":[{"name":"status","type":"string","value":"il fait trop chaud"}]}},"subservice":"/testalain","service":"testservice"},{"_id":"5aa86bdb2c9dd4000155a271","name":"my_rule_update_tm","text":"select *,\"my_rule_update_tm\" as ruleName from pattern [every ev=iotEvent(cast(cast(temperature?,String),float)>15.0 and cast(cast(temperature?,String),float)<30.0 and type=\"thing\")]","action":{"type":"update","parameters":{"attributes":[{"name":"status","type":"string","value":"il fait bon"}]}},"subservice":"/testalain","service":"testservice"},{"_id":"5aa86c4e2c9dd4000155a272","name":"my_rule_update_tb","text":"select *,\"my_rule_update_tb\" as ruleName from pattern [every ev=iotEvent(cast(cast(temperature?,String),float)<15.0 and cast(cast(temperature?,String),float)>5.0 and type=\"thing\")]","action":{"type":"update","parameters":{"attributes":[{"name":"status","type":"string","value":"il fait froid"}]}},"subservice":"/testalain","service":"testservice"},{"_id":"5aa86c932c9dd4000155a273","name":"my_rule_update_ttb","text":"select *,\"my_rule_update_ttb\" as ruleName from pattern [every ev=iotEvent(cast(cast(temperature?,String),float)<5.0 and type=\"thing\")]","action":{"type":"update","parameters":{"attributes":[{"name":"status","type":"string","value":"là on se les gèle !!!"}]}},"subservice":"/testalain","service":"testservice"}]}
